message.body: So....the Curtis center might not work for us. Haha. Someone said that it was around $160 a head and that was in 2011. There's a minimum of 175 guests. Hahaha. That's your mom's wedding budget right there!
Go big or stay home :-P You have NO IDEA how much monies id gleefully flush so that i could tell you "i do" in what ever place you wanted to make that memory in
You....are....amazing. I mean, I guess on the plus side, decor, food, and the wedding cake would be (hopefully) included in that price.
Haha i seriously hope so. Only other expenses as far as i see it are what goes on the bodies :) That dress thang you wanna wear
Hehehe. Muahahaha! Love it!!
Heheh mmmmhm!
I love you!
Love you too!! Lots and lots and lots! And...see you tomorrow!
YESSSS! DO NOT miss your bus. I will KILL you!
Ahah well alrighty then!! I most definitely will not miss the bus!
Hehe. Thanks!
Hahahahahah. Toothless! You're so sweet! I like it!
Eh who needs em. Ice cream for B, L and D
? You lost me! B L and D?
Pssshhh geeeet with it, my darling love! Breakfast, lunch and dinner haha.
AHHHH!!! I didn't read the "for!!" Yes!!! Let's do it!!!
Yippeeee!!!
We are gonna have an AMAZING life together and I honestly cannot wait
Haha pretty lady, that amazing life began a good while ago :) We dont have to wait for a second. That living together detail tho...holy moly yes. Plz plz plz
Hahah. You're right! As always!!! We need to be in the same state and then the same building and then the same room and then THE SAME BED!
How was the interview btw?
Haha yes!! All of that! Soooo excited for that day. And it was good. Quite painless. Im doing follow up writing/translation assignments tho. Not in the mood
Ehhh I don't blame you!
Ahh sorry. I call in two seconds. I gotta brusha the teefs
Teleporting is a thing, right? I see you now?? Dont want to wait any longer!!
Surrrree! At least it should've been by now!
Haha well you best be ready! Heading to the bus!
YESSSSSSSS!
Hey i hope you dont mind but i just set you up for a blind date. Scruffy-ish dude. My height, blonde, blue eyes, etc. I think you'll get on well
How are you doing, baby?
